name: Djent
details:
Modern Hi Gain DistortionThis mini monster meets the need of every djentleman. More than that, it's an all-round mega tool for modern tone maniacs.
Featuring wideranged mid and gain control, a tight low end and great definition, from raw crunch, classic heavy metal to modern prog metal and heavy core, you get the whole gamut with extended switching options.
Use the 3-way mini toggle to select from 3 finely tuned sound characters.
https://www.hotoneaudio.com/products/skyline/distortion/148.html
